scenario_text.value:
(Piedmon is...too strong... And Agumon is not
looking good right now...)
(At this rate, he’s going to die!)
Gah! Urgh!
Takuma...I’m sorry... I...can’t...

(Piedmon is...too strong... And Greymon is
not looking good right now...)
(At this rate, he’s going to die!)
Urgh... Grr... Augh...!
Takuma...I’ve got...nothing...left.

(Piedmon is...too strong... And Tyrannomon is
not looking good right now...)
(At this rate, he’s going to die!)
Urgh! I...I...
I’ve got nothing left...

(Piedmon is...too strong... And Tuskmon is
not looking good right now...)
(At this rate, he’s going to die!)
Urgh!
This...can’t be it. I cannot...fail... Gah!

(Piedmon is...too strong... And SkullGreymon
is not looking good right now...)
(At this rate, he’s going to die!)
Grrr... Grrraaawwwrrr!
Gwaar...!

(Piedmon is...too strong... And MetalGreymon
is not looking good right now...)
(At this rate, he’s going to die!)
Urgh!

Gah! It’s no...use. Takuma, I’m sorry... I...
failed.

(Piedmon is...too strong... And Triceramon is
not looking good right now...)
(At this rate, he’s going to die!)
Nnngh! Gah!

This...can’t be it. I need...to make
Takuma...proud.

(Piedmon is...too strong... And Megadramon is
not looking good right now...)
(At this rate, he’s going to die!)
Urgh... Ungh!

That was...all I had...and yet... Takuma, I’m
sorry... I can’t go on...

(Piedmon is...too strong... And WarGreymon is
not looking good right now...)
(At this rate, he’s going to die!)
Gah! Urgh!

I hate to admit it...but that was all I had.
I’m afraid I can’t even stand...

(Piedmon is...too strong... And Dinorexmon is
not looking good right now...)
(At this rate, he’s going to die!)
No... This can’t be...the end.

Tell me, Takuma. Why is it that now, before
such a mighty foe, my heart does not stir?

(Piedmon is...too strong... And Machinedramon
is not looking good right now...)
(At this rate, he’s going to die!)
Urgh! Gaaaaaah!

It’s no use... Takuma, I lack the strength to
fight any more...

(Piedmon is...too strong... And Fanglongmon
is not looking good right now...)
(At this rate, he’s going to die!)

Whatever strength Piedmon may...or may not
have left...this is too much...

Ah, that I should be reduced to this...
Takuma, remember our time together!

(Piedmon is...too strong... And Omegamon is
not looking good right now...)
(At this rate, he’s going to die!)
No... I cannot...fall...here...

Takuma? What’s wrong? Your voice has left my
heart... Your support, my strength, is gone.

Hahaha! Is that all you’ve got? I was hoping
you’d at least make this interesting.

He’s so strong... Is there no way we can beat
him?
(Agumon’s in bad shape.)
(At this rate, he’s going to die!)
Gah! Urgh!

Takuma... I won the fight, but... I don’t
think...I’m going to make it...
(Greymon’s in bad shape.)
(At this rate, he’s going to die!)
Urgh... Grr... Augh...!
We won, Takuma...but I’ve got nothing left...
(Tyrannomon’s in bad shape.)
(At this rate, he’s going to die!)
Urgh! I...I...
I won...but Takuma...I’ve got nothing left...
(Tuskmon’s in bad shape.)
(At this rate, he’s going to die!)
Urgh!

I won, but still...how pathetic. This can’t
be it... There’s still so much...to do...
(SkullGreymon’s in bad shape.)
(At this rate, he’s going to die!)
Grrr... Grrraaawwwrrr!
Grrrr...
(MetalGreymon’s in bad shape.)
(At this rate, he’s going to die!)
Urgh!
I won, Takuma... Urgh... I feel so weak...
(Triceramon’s in bad shape.)
(At this rate, he’s going to die!)
Nnngh! Gah!

I...won... Why so sad, Takuma? This is...
nothing... Urgh...
(Megadramon’s in bad shape.)
(At this rate, he’s going to die!)
Urgh... Ungh!

That victory took everything I had... Takuma,
this may be it...
(WarGreymon’s in bad shape.)
(At this rate, he’s going to die!)
Gah! Urgh!

I’m glad...we won, but...I can’t seem...to
stand up...
(Dinorexmon’s in bad shape.)
(At this rate, he’s going to die!)
No... This can’t be...the end.

Takuma, are you all right? Did I keep you...
safe? Because this might...be it...for me...
(Machinedramon’s in bad shape.)
(At this rate, he’s going to die!)
Urgh! Gaaaaaah!

We won? Urgh... Takuma... I don’t think...I
have anything left...
(Fanglongmon’s in bad shape.)
(At this rate, he’s going to die!)

Curse you, Piedmon! Finally met your end, eh?
To think you possessed such strength...

Takuma, somehow we’ve proved victorious. But
now I’m at the end of my strength...
(Omegamon’s in bad shape.)
(At this rate, he’s going to die!)
No... I cannot...fall...here...

Takuma, thanks to your support, I was able to
triumph... But now that power has run out.
*gasp* *pant* *pant*! It’s not...over yet.

Hahaha! Is that all you’ve got? Or can you
make things even more interesting?

You’re kidding me... This guy’s strength is
unreal! Is there no way we can beat him?
No, I can’t give up. I can do this!
I am not worthless!!!

On your feet one last time, Agumon! We’ll
show them who’s pathetic!

Takuma... It’s no use. I can’t... It’d kill
me... *pant* *pant*

On your feet one last time, Greymon! We’ll
show them who’s pathetic!

Takuma...can’t you see? I no longer have the
strength to win.

On your feet one last time, Tyrannomon!
We’ll show them who’s pathetic!

Takuma...I can’t. Our hearts are too far
apart...

On your feet one last time, Tuskmon! We’ll
show them who’s pathetic!

Takuma...can’t you see? I can’t... It will be
the end of us...

On your feet one last time, SkullGreymon!
We’ll show them who’s pathetic!
Grrraaawwwrrr!!! Rrraaawwwrrr!

On your feet one last time, MetalGreymon!
We’ll show them who’s pathetic!

What? Takuma...what’s wrong with you? What do
you think I am?

On your feet one last time, Triceramon! We’ll
show them who’s pathetic!
Ah... I see... Is that what you think of me?

On your feet one last time, Megadramon! We’ll
show them who’s pathetic!

Takuma, have you lost your mind? Do you even
know what you’re asking?

On your feet one last time, WarGreymon! We’ll
show them who’s pathetic!

Oh, what a fool I’ve been. To think how much
I gave for such a miserable human being.

On your feet one last time, Dinorexmon! We’ll
show them who’s pathetic!

Ah, I see now... I failed to protect your
heart.

On your feet one last time, Machinedramon!
We’ll show them who’s pathetic!

And who are you to be calling anyone else
pathetic, Takuma?

On your feet one last time, Fanglongmon!
We’ll show them who’s pathetic!

How can I have been such a fool? Never should
I have sought the light in you.

On your feet one last time, Omegamon! We’ll
show them who’s pathetic!

It’s no use... Takuma, return to your senses
at once! Quickly, while I still remain!

Come on, what’s wrong with you?! If you lose,
they’re right, I’m worthless!

Now get back up, you stupid piece of crap!
Let’s go! Right now, Agumon!!!

Now get back up, you stupid piece of crap!
Let’s go! Right now, Greymon!!!

Now get back up, you stupid piece of crap!
Let’s go! Right now, Tyrannomon!!!

Now get back up, you stupid piece of crap!
Let’s go! Right now, Tuskmon!!!

Now get back up, you stupid piece of crap!
Let’s go! Right now, SkullGreymon!!!

Now get back up, you stupid piece of crap!
Let’s go! Right now, MetalGreymon!!!

Now get back up, you stupid piece of crap!
Let’s go! Right now, Triceramon!!!

Now get back up, you stupid piece of crap!
Let’s go! Right now, Megadramon!!!

Now get back up, you stupid piece of crap!
Let’s go! Right now, WarGreymon!!!

Now get back up, you stupid piece of crap!
Let’s go! Right now, Dinorexmon!!!

Now get back up, you stupid piece of crap!
Let’s go! Right now, Machinedramon!!!

Now get back up, you stupid piece of crap!
Let’s go! Right now, Fanglongmon!!!

Now get back up, you stupid piece of crap!
Let’s go! Right now, Omegamon!!!
Urgh... Gaaah!
Urgh... Gaaah!
Urgh... Gaaah!
Urgh... Gaaah!
Urgh... Gaaah!
Urgh... Gaaah!
Urgh... Gaaah!
Urgh... Gaaah!
Urgh... Gaaah!
Urgh... Gaaah!
Urgh... Gaaah!
Urgh... Gaaah!
Urgh... Gaaah!
What’s wrong? Agumon? What’s happening?

(No matter how much I yell, Agumon only
writhes in pain. And...)
What’s wrong? Greymon? What’s happening?

(No matter how much I yell, Greymon only
writhes in pain. And...)
What’s wrong? Tyrannomon? What’s happening?

(No matter how much I yell, Tyrannomon only
writhes in pain. And...)
What’s wrong? Tuskmon? What’s happening?

(No matter how much I yell, Tuskmon only
writhes in pain. And...)
What’s wrong? SkullGreymon? What’s happening?

(No matter how much I yell, SkullGreymon only
writhes in pain. And...)
What’s wrong? MetalGreymon? What’s happening?

(No matter how much I yell, MetalGreymon only
writhes in pain. And...)
What’s wrong? Triceramon? What’s happening?

(No matter how much I yell, Triceramon only
writhes in pain. And...)
What’s wrong? Megadramon? What’s happening?

(No matter how much I yell, Megadramon only
writhes in pain. And...)
What’s wrong? WarGreymon? What’s happening?

(No matter how much I yell, WarGreymon only
writhes in pain. And...)
What’s wrong? Dinorexmon? What’s happening?

(No matter how much I yell, Dinorexmon only
writhes in pain. And...)

What’s wrong? Machinedramon? What’s
happening?

(No matter how much I yell, Machinedramon
only writhes in pain. And...)
What’s wrong? Fanglongmon? What’s happening?

(No matter how much I yell, Fanglongmon only
writhes in pain. And...)
What’s wrong? Omegamon? What’s happening?

(No matter how much I yell, Omegamon only
writhes in pain. And...)
Graaaaaagh!
Hurgh!!! No! It can’t be! This power... Gah!

No way! You took out Piedmon in just one
blow?
Yes! Ahahahahahahaha! Who’s worthless now?
Yaaaaaah!

Hey, stop! What’s wrong with you? Agumon,
stop! Cut it out!

Hey, stop! What’s wrong with you? Greymon,
stop! Cut it out!

Hey, stop! What’s wrong with you? Tyrannomon,
stop! Cut it out!

Hey, stop! What’s wrong with you? Tuskmon,
stop! Cut it out!

Hey, stop! What’s wrong with you?
SkullGreymon, stop! Cut it out!

Hey, stop! What’s wrong with you?
MetalGreymon, stop! Cut it out!

Hey, stop! What’s wrong with you? Triceramon,
stop! Cut it out!

Hey, stop! What’s wrong with you? Megadramon,
stop! Cut it out!

Hey, stop! What’s wrong with you? WarGreymon,
stop! Cut it out!

Hey, stop! What’s wrong with you? Dinorexmon,
stop! Cut it out!

Hey, stop! What’s wrong with you?
Machinedramon, stop! Cut it out!

Hey, stop! What’s wrong with you?
Fanglongmon, stop! Cut it out!

Hey, stop! What’s wrong with you? Omegamon,
stop! Cut it out!
Graaaawr! Raaaah!

(It’s no use. Even I can’t get through.
He’s just attacking anything that moves.)

(My friends just keep falling, one after
another.)
Raaaah!
(In the end, I’m the only one left standing.)
Gwaar...!

(Dead...they’re all dead. No one else
survived...)
(And that...is the end of our fight.)
